text: Madeleine "Maddie" Blaustein (October 9, 1960 – December 11, 2008) was an American voice actress. Until her death, Blaustein was the voice of Sartorius in Yu-Gi-Oh! GX. She was also the voice of Meowth in the Pokémon anime. == Personal life == Blaustein was born intersex. She was a male when she was born, and lived as male for many years until changing to female. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:2008 deaths Category:American voice actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American LGBT people Category:LGBT people from New York (state) Category:Transgender Jews Category:Transgender women
title: Maddie Blaustein
